PAD_1P.synopsis: AD about a wall with protective charms and prayers written by Harpers attacking Ketheric's Outpost.
PAD_1P.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_AApproach the TollhouseOn the right you will see prayers written on the wall. Click on them.

PAD_2P.synopsis: AD about a wall with protective charms and prayers written by Harpers attacking Ketheric's Outpost.
PAD_2P.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_AApproach the TollhouseOn the right you will see prayers written on the wall. Click on them.

PAD_1P_0.speaker: Player
PAD_1P_0.text: Prayers, charms, battle cries - the Harpers' work. They were primed for combat.

PAD_2P_0.speaker: Player
PAD_2P_0.text: Prayers, charms, battle cries - the Harpers' work. They were primed for combat.

PAD_2P_1.speaker: Player
PAD_2P_1.text: A commemoration of battles long past. Like the town itself.
